name: meauxbility-monorepo
description: Unified monorepo for Meauxbility Foundation's November 3rd launch

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:meauxbility" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:shop" "npm run dev:media"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:meauxbility && npm run build:admin && npm run build:shop && npm run build:media
scripts.install:all: cd apps/meauxbility-org && npm install && cd ../admin-portal-production && npm install && cd ../inneranimals-shop && npm install && cd ../inneranimalmedia && npm install
